metadata.title: CVE-2018-18956 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The ProcessMimeEntity function in util-decode-mime.c in Suricata 4.x before4.0.6 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (segfault anddaemon crash) via crafted input to the SMTP parser, as exploited in thewild in November 2018.

criterions.comment: suricata package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
